mapper.select: select 7 as weekDay, 30 as monthDay, DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") as statisticsDate, sum(question_num) as questionNum, sum(user_num) as userNum, sum(problem_submit_num) as problemSubmitNum, sum(user_activity_num) as userActivity from teach_home_statistics

select statistics_date as dataX, ifNull(user_activity_num, 0) as dataY from teach_home_statistics where statistics_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL #{day} day), "%Y-%m-%d") and statistics_date <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY statistics_date asc

SELECT statistics_date as dataX, ifNull(problem_submit_num, 0) as dataY FROM teach_home_statistics WHERE statistics_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY), "%Y-%m-%d") AND statistics_date <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY statistics_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into teach_home_statistics(statistics_date, question_num, user_num, problem_submit_num, user_activity_num) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d"), IFNULL(sum(t1.num), 0) AS questionNum, IFNULL(sum(t2.num), 0) AS problemSubmitNum, IFNULL(sum(t3.num), 0) AS userNum, IFNULL(sum(t4.num), 0) AS userActivity FROM (SELECT sum(1) AS num FROM problem_code WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day), "%Y-%m-%d") and deleted = 0 UNION ALL SELECT sum(1) AS num FROM problem_choice WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day), "%Y-%m-%d") and deleted = 0 UNION ALL SELECT sum(1) AS num FROM problem_fill WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day), "%Y-%m-%d") and deleted = 0) t1, (SELECT sum(1) AS num FROM judge_record WHERE DATE_FORMAT(submit_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day), "%Y-%m-%d")) t2, (SELECT sum(1) AS num FROM sys_user WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day), "%Y-%m-%d")) t3, (SELECT sum(1) AS num FROM sys_log_login WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day), "%Y-%m-%d") GROUP BY username) t4 ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE question_num = VALUES (question_num), user_num= VALUES (user_num), problem_submit_num= VALUES ( problem_submit_num), user_activity_num= VALUES (user_activity_num)
